help.tips:
Tips:
1. Via calendars you can create Nextcloud events and get events within certain period of time.
2. If you are creating an event and you have a Zoom or Google Meet link, paste it into descriptions.
3. If you want to upload file to Nextcloud, upload it to Mattermost and choose "Message actions" and then "Upload to Nextcloud".
